bugs: Fixed bug when duplicated recipients were added on `reply to all` action.
Fixed bug with displaying too long recipients names.

features: Added “Appearance” panel to MailBar preferences.
bugs: Fixed MailBar freeze on multiple monitors OS X setup.

features: Fixed MailBar look with Dark Mode appearance.
bugs: Fixed small vertical line in menu bar icon, that dislayed on Retina screens.
Fixed quality of some icons on Retina screens.
Minor bug fixes.

features: Added message font synchronization between MailBar and Mail.app.

bugs: Fixed problem with not visible messages in Gmail accounts, which have the same sender and recipient.
Fixed license activation process.
Minor bug fixes.

features: Some user interface improvements.
Additional localizations.
Added more info tooltips to the buttons.
Updated MailBar icon.
bugs: Some minor bug fixes.

features: Added new unread badge in case conversation has more than one unread message.
Added banner with junk status to the message view.
bugs: Fixed video, audio, html attachments display issues.
Fixed problem with sending not empty email body in 10.10.2.
Fixed problem with displaying large image attachments.

features: Added “check new mail” button.
Optimized performance for group operations with messages.
Added “sent messages” to conversations.
Added group operations with conversations: “mark as read”, “mark as junk”.
Added to preferences the option to enable/disable Mail.app dock icon customization.
bugs: Fixed bug with MailBar popover disappears after focus changes to another app, even when mouse is over popover.

features: Added support of signatures which are configured in Mail.app.
Added ability to send emails from Gmail aliases.
Added to preferences the option to show/hide messages count in the menu bar.
bugs: Fixed duplicates in the list of messages after replying or forwarding in some cases.

features: Added shortcuts support.
Added an option to change color flag for a specific message.
bugs: Fixed issue which was faced when Mail.app was offline and new plugin has been installed, MailBar shows the “restart button” and not the “open button”.
Fixed issue with some messages which were not displayed in the list of messages in case they were received at same time with the update while loading the full list of messages.
Fixed “open message” in Mail.app feature in Yosemite (10.10).
Fixed click interface through status notification views.
Fixed the way attachments were displayed in list of messages.
Fixed focus search field on every MailBar popover open.
Fixed adding to the “reply message” mode full html content, now only body content.
Fixed swipe usage over recipients’ views.

features: Added new icons to the preference tabs.
Fixed poor text rendering inside the mode “messages”.
Small style fixes.
Added calendar events integration.
Added a confirmation mode while leaving the “compose message” mode.
